name: WP Netmon Status
author: Tino Dietel

sections.description:
Shows networkinformations from (Freifunk)Netmon as a WordPress-Widget. The plugin will use the REST-API to collect informations about routers that are online or offline and connected clients and show the numpers in a Widget.

See Widget-Demo at http://www.freifunk-emskirchen.de/

for netmon see https://git.nordwest.freifunk.net/root/netmon
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin-directory to your WordPress-plugin folder.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. In Design -> Widgets add the Widget where you want it to be
  4. Configure the Widget by adding your netmon-url like “https://netmon.my-freifunk.de/”
sections.changelog:
1.0.2

  • new version to force correct version to show in plugindirectory

1.0.1

  • client-color fixed

1.0

  • Initial release
